statements: SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policy_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policy_id = 12345 AND claim_status = 'Pending'
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE policy_id IN (54321, 67890) AND claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claims_data WHERE claim_status IN ('Submitted', 'Under Review')
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claimed_amount FROM claims_data WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT investigator_name, note_date, note_details FROM investigation_notes ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimed_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claimed_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claimed_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claimant_name ASC;
SELECT claimant_name, SUM(claimed_amount) AS total_claimed_amount FROM claims_data GROUP BY claimant_name HAVING total_claimed_amount > 5000;
SELECT cd.claimant_name, in.note_date FROM claims_data cd JOIN investigation_notes in ON cd.claim_id = in.claim_id WHERE in.note_details LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY in.note_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, SUM(claimed_amount) AS total_claimed_amount FROM claims_data GROUP BY claimant_name ORDER BY total_claimed_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE is_fraudulent = true ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_id = 123456;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 'POL123';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 'POL456' AND claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, policy_number FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC, claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 'P12345' AND claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 'P56789' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_type LIKE '%car%' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND policy_number = 'P99999';
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount FROM claims_data JOIN claimants ON claims_data.claim_id = claimants.claim_id WHERE claim_amount > 5000;

SELECT investigator_name, investigation_date, fraudulent_activity_description FROM investigations JOIN fraud_patterns ON investigations.investigation_id = fraud_patterns.investigation_id ORDER BY investigation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC, claim_id
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE policy_number = 'POL123' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT c.claim_id, c.policy_number, i.investigator_name FROM claims_data c JOIN investigations i ON c.claim_id = i.claim_id
SELECT c.*, cl.claimant_name FROM claims_data c JOIN claimants cl ON c.claim_id = cl.claim_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000
SELECT f.pattern_id, i.investigator_name, f.fraudulent_activity_description FROM fraud_patterns f JOIN investigations i ON f.investigation_id = i.investigation_id
SELECT * FROM claims_data
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims_data
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE policy_start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT claim_id, document_type FROM claim_documents WHERE is_validated = true
SELECT * FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, is_fraudulent FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_information WHERE policy_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, document_type FROM claim_documents WHERE is_validated = true;
SELECT c.claim_id, p.pattern_description FROM suspicious_claims sc JOIN fraud_patterns p ON sc.pattern_id = p.pattern_id JOIN claims_data c ON sc.claim_id = c.claim_id;
